summary: I USED A $5 PRODUCT PROMOTED BY GM TO SEAL A LEAK IN THE RADIATOR OF MY 1995 CHEVROLET ASTRO VAN. IT SEALED THE RADIATOR OFF FROM THE ENGINE CAUSING CATASTROPHIC DAMAGE TO THE ENGINE. MY VAN NOW EITHER NEEDS A NEW ENGINE OR TO BE REPLACED. GM (CHEVROLET AND PARTS & SERVICE TOLD ME THAT SINCE MY VAN IS 8 YRS OLD WITH HIGH MILEAGE IT IS MY PROBLEM AND THEY WILL NOT HELP ME RECTIFY THE PROBLEM.THER THAN A SMALL WATER LEAK THE VAN HAD NO MECHANIC ISSUES PRIOR TO USING GM VEHICLE CARE PRODUCT COOLING SYSTEM SEAL TABS  1#12378254 GR.8.800  IT IS NOW A SAFETY ISSUE AS THE ENGINE LURCHES UNEXPECTEDLY.
